blocks.name: oppgle
blocks.content: less-than relation of an opposite group. (Contributed by Thierry Arnoux, 13-Apr-2018.)

blocks.name: oppglt
blocks.content: less-than relation of an opposite group. (Contributed by Thierry Arnoux, 13-Apr-2018.)
blocks.origin:
thm oppglt(class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3) {
  |- wi(wcel(c0, c1), wceq(c2, cfv(cplt, c3)))
  -| wceq(c3, cfv(coppg, c0))
  -| wceq(c2, cfv(cplt, c0))
} = {
  syl6eqr(c2, cfv(cplt, c3), cdif(cfv(cple, c0), cid), wcel(c0, c1))
  pltfval(c0, c1, c2, cfv(cple, c0))
  ax-mp(wceq(cfv(cplt, c3), cdif(cfv(cple, c0), cid)), wcel(c3, universe))
  fvexi(c3, coppg, c0)
  pltfval(c3, universe, cfv(cplt, c3), cfv(cple, c0))
  oppgle(cfv(cple, c0), c3, c0)
  eqid(cfv(cple, c0))
  eqid(cfv(cplt, c3))
}
blocks.pretty:
thm oppglt(class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3) {
  ‚ä¢ (c0 ‚àà c1 ‚Üí c2 =(lt ` c3))
  ‚ä£ c3 =(oppG ` c0)
  ‚ä£ c2 =(lt ` c0)
} = {
  syl6eqr(c2, (lt ` c3), ((le ` c0)\ =), c0 ‚àà c1)
  pltfval(c0, c1, c2, (le ` c0))
  ax-mp((lt ` c3)=((le ` c0)\ =), c3 ‚àà ùïå)
  fvexi(c3, coppg, c0)
  pltfval(c3, universe, (lt ` c3), (le ` c0))
  oppgle((le ` c0), c3, c0)
  eqid((le ` c0))
  eqid((lt ` c3))
}
